td.p: [[Data:RecipientName]] was unable to pass the security check, and was therefore unable to activate their account.

Be sure to communicate the access code to the user.

The Sender has required this document to be digitally signed via a Novartis Digital Signature. The Signer will be asked to select their digital certificate during the signing process.

tr.td: A Cancelled Fax Was Received From You

td.p: FaxId [[Data:FaxId]] was received but our records indicate you chose to cancel the fax transmission.
The fax was intended for envelope [[Data:EnvelopeID]].
If it was not your intention to cancel this fax transaction, please contact our support staff to correct this by doing one of the following:
1) Forward this email with a note indicating that you want the contents of the fax incorporated into the envelope (envelope [[Data:EnvelopeID]]).

2) Go to http://www.docusign.com/support and choose one of the support options; please indicate the fax Id ([[FaxId]]) and envelope Id ([[Data:EnvelopeID]]) when you reach a member of our support team.
[[Data:SenderName]]
